price: 10. Nummah Qhuraan kitaabay addunyaa kee akeeral nabna siinik edde tani siinih oobisnek, eile makas-kassowtaanaa?
arabic: لَقَدۡ أَنزَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكُمۡ كِتَٰبٗا فِيهِ ذِكۡرُكُمۡۚ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: laqad anzalnā ilaykum kitāban fīhi dhik'rukum afalā taʿqilūna
